title: Rifftrax - R.O.T.O.R.mp4
description:
R.O.T.O.R. could be described as The Room meets Cyborg Cop 2, and if that makes any sense to you at all then you know how excited we are about it!

ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s an embarrassment of riches, where to begin? Our hero Captain J.B. Coldyron, police robotics genius and ranch owner, whose dialogue was all dubbed by a different actor and written by a different species? The goofy office robot who somehow possesses more sophisticated intelligence than the dangerous Ã¢â‚¬Å“advancedÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ prototype on the loose, aka R.O.T.O.R.? Or what the acronym R.O.T.O.R. itself stands for: Robotic Officer of the Tactical Operations Research. Yes, the last word in the killer police robotÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s name is Research, for some reason. Except later in the movie, when it suddenly stands for Reserve instead. Why? If you want an explanation, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d better ask Shoeboogie, the wacky Native American janitor who loves to dance. Actually, donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t ask Shoeboogie anything, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s probably best to avoid all eye contact with Shoeboogie.

Coldyron! Research! Shoeboogie! If you say those words real fast they kind of sound like a song, but theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re also three of the many reasons you should join Mike, Kevin, and Bill for the wonder of wonders that is R.O.T.O.R.!
